code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import SLIDER_IMAGES from'../data/sliderImages';import Carousel from'react-bootstrap/Carousel';import'../styles/Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{const nextIndex=(currentIndex+1)%SLIDER_IMAGES.length;setCurrentIndex(nextIndex);},2050);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[currentIndex]);const currentSlide=SLIDER_IMAGES[currentIndex];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"af-height-90 af-max-width mx-auto mt-2 position-relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{activeIndex:currentIndex,onSelect:index=>setCurrentIndex(index),controls:true,indicators:true,children:SLIDER_IMAGES.map((slide,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"d-block w-100",src:slide.link,alt:slide.title})},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-caption position-absolute",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"af-position-lg af-bg-dark-transparent py-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:currentSlide.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:currentSlide.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/redondo-beach",className:"btn btn-primary transparent-btn",children:"Redondo Beach"}),' ','',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/lomita",className:"btn btn-primary transparent-btn",children:"Lomita"})]})]})})]});};export default Home;
